title: Series A Preferred Stock Purchase Agreement

obligations.description: Redeem shares if no qualified IPO by January 1, 2030

special_terms: One designated board observer seat for the investor
Quarterly unaudited and annual audited financial statements provided to investor
Right to maintain ownership percentage in future financings
Investors must participate in company sale if approved by majority holders
8% annual return on a non-cumulative dividend
Investors participate pro-rata in remaining proceeds
Weighted average anti-dilution protection in down rounds
termination_conditions: Not specified, but implicit in redemption rights and failure to go public by January 1, 2030
